title: WTB: Roger Maris Team Issue Postcards

posts.post_title: WTB: Roger Maris Team Issue Postcards
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone I am looking for team issue Roger Maris Postcards.  I believe he has one for Cleveland, Kansas City, and St Louis.  If anyone has any for sale please message me through the board or at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  Thanks for your time

William
